title: "Young robotics create limbs for the disabled"
excerpt: "In the suburbs of Kikuyu in Kiambu county, two young men are fiddling with wires and electric cables in their workshop, their grandmothers' former granary. Moses Kiuna, 29, and his cousin David Gathu have been doing this since they were children."
